title: Non-critical Elevator - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
author: 素熙
description:
'I like you.' The man suddenly looked up and said to the opposite man, very very sincere.

'……I do not accept.'

'I really like you, Xiǎoxīn. I have liked you since I was a student. I like you is not the kind of impulsive like, but really treat you as a lifelong lover.

'I said ah, Xué dì, can you...'

'I like you! I like you very much! I can't live without you in my life. I can't live without you, just like a fish can't leave water, a bird can't live without the sky, and a zhái nán can't leave a computer. Xiaoxin, I really like……' (Otaku)

'So I said, Xue di...' the man opposite sighed.

'Don't you accept it, Xiaoxin? Is it because I am not good enough? If this is the case, I can change it... I can...'
The opposite man finally couldn’t help it.

'I said, Xue di, the question is not whether I accept it or not ... but do you think this situation is suitable for thinking about such things?'>
